As soon as they walk in Thirst jumps on Lobstruck and bites at his 
neck attempting to suck a little energon out.

Thirst: MUST FEED!!!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
>    Running down the halls of the Sacrilege Plague, Lobstruck turns

>

did 
> you run into us?"
